title: one
content: Create a production brief with the details of your change (refer to these guidelines)

title: two
content: Attach the production brief to a new JIRA ticket assigned to your Digital Producer

title: three
content:
Attach the following artefacts to the JIRA ticket to support your request:

  • A completed "Marketing Checklist - General" relating to your product
  • This document, as a record of our conversation
